review: I like it, able to switch to different TV's. You do need Amazon Prime membership.
author: Tostman

review: I love my fire stick, I just wish that I could use my remote on downloaded side apps, that would make it absolutely perfect
author: Regina Ann Morgan

review: Ordered one for my parents when they were first available to Prime members. Liked it so much, I ordered one.
author: tory almond

review: I like it, it is super to be able to just watch stuff on the tv without messing with cables and cords and whatnot. I just wish it was easier to search for stuff. It might be me that is the problem, maybe I haven't spent enough time with it yet. But evn if I can't figure it out, i am still happy with this purchase.
author: Kathleen C.

review: Rad. Better than chromecast by far
author: swaggasaurus rex

review: Fire stick works great faster to start then the Roku 3500R. Not as many video apps yet though.
author: Rick "Rick"
